Header: 480 admitted to the National Hospital within last 24 hours
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) â€“ Due to accidents that have taken place within the past 24 hours 480 people were admitted to the National Hospital. 156 of these people are in-house patients of the National Hospital. 110 persons were injured due to motor accidents while another 54 patients were injured due to domestic accidents. Data gathered show a drop in accidents compared to last year.
